alert.note: Alert for Dane; Dodge; Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 4:49PM CDT until August 24 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... Southwestern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 449 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waterloo, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Watertown, Jefferson, Columbus, Waterloo, Johnson Creek, Milford, Reeseville, Richwood, Danville, and Hubbleton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
